name: Le Chat Foncé: Treats or Treats!
name_original: Le Chat Foncé: Treats or Treats!
description:
Our human friend is sick! Can you help me collect candies?

Happy Halloween! It`s being a while since I published any Chat Foncé game :D!

Same controls! WASD or Arrows but this time 1 to 5 will change COSTUMES!!

Note: this game may be a little more challenging than the previous ones!

Game by Roberto Romao

Music "CAREFREE DAYS AT PELICAN SHORES" by Eric Matyas
